Refs

  1. Energy-Efficient Neuronal Computation via Quantal Synaptic Failures, William B. Levy and Robert A. Baxter; vThe Journal of Neuroscience, June 1, 2002, 22(11)

Quantal Synaptic Failures

ä¸»è¦å‚è€ƒRef.1.

Prior Knowledge: Basic Mathematical Modeling of Neurons, a information theory perspective.

Perspective 1: æ ‘çªä½“æ±‚å’Œ ç­‰ä»·äº é¦™å†œä¿¡é“ã€‚

éšæœºçš„çªè§¦ä¿¡å·ä¼ é€’è¿‡ç¨‹è¢«è§†ä½œæ ‘çªä½“æ±‚å’Œçš„ä¸€éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯åƒä¹‹å‰è§†ä½œè½´çªä¿¡æ¯ä¼ é€’ã€‚ç”Ÿç‰©å­¦å®¶æ›¾è§‚æµ‹åˆ°ï¼Œæ¯ä¸€æ¬¡åŠ¨ä½œç”µä½çš„å‘æ”¾å¯¼è‡´çš„ç¥ç»é€’è´¨ä¼ é€’æ˜¯å­˜åœ¨ä¸€å®šçš„æ•…éšœç‡çš„ã€‚

åœ¨æµ·é©¬ä½“å’Œæ–°çš®è´¨ä¸­ï¼Œå…´å¥‹æ€§çªè§¦å ä¸»å¯¼åœ°ä½ï¼Œä¸”éå¸¸ä¸å¯é ã€‚åŠ¨ä½œç”µä½è¾¾åˆ°çªè§¦å‰æ—¶å¼•èµ·çš„ç¥ç»é€’è´¨é‡å­åŒ…å‘æ”¾çš„æ¦‚ç‡çº¦ä¸º0.25-0.5ï¼ˆ0.25æœ€å¸¸è§ï¼‰ã€‚
In the hippocampus and in neocortex, excitatory synaptic connections dominate and are remarkably unreliable. Each synapse transmits, at most, a single standardized package called a quantum (10410^4104 neurotransmitter molecules). When an action potential arrives presynaptically, the probability of evoking the release of one such quantal package is reported to range from 0.25 to 0.5 with 0.5 being less common and 0.25 being quite common (Thomson, 2000), especially when one takes into account the spontaneous rates of neurons (Stevens and Wang, 1994; Destexhe and PareÂ´, 1999).
